trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Manchester
There was one other sighting in Manchester on or around April 16th 2007
Summary: some blue flashes in the sky
divs: Sighting Detailsat around quarter past 12 at night some blue flashes lit up the sky, so went outside and saw 3 or 4 blue flashes gliding across the sky. every now and then they would glow brighter and then they stopped and glowed white and they were gone.
